Job Description: Welcome to Eureka Infotech, Inc :: Ideas Put Into Action   Current Job Opportunities 17     TITLE:   Software Developers    Multiple openings:      DUTIES:       Design, develop, test, and deploy applications and use and support AgileScrum processes.   Analyze and document requirements, design software solutions, and define technical architecture.   Write specifications and maintain, enhance, and develop application software.   Develop ASP.Net Web APIs, deploy applications, and design and develop prototypes.    Study systems, prepare reports, and perform code conversions and unit and integration testing.    Work with ASP.Net , C#, .Net Framework, LINQ, Json, HTML, JQuery, JavaScript, AngularJS, Bootstrap, Web API, Visual Studio, and TFS. 40 hrswk.    EDUCATION REQUIREMENTS:   Must have Master's degree or equivalent in Computer Science, Electr Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, or a related field (will accept a Bachelor's degree plus 5 years of progressive post baccalaureate experience in lieu of a Master's)Must be willing to travelrelocate to unanticipated locations throughout the US on short notice for extended periods of time..
